summary: Activity 1 (Your Leadership Word) content and UI text updates requested.

existing_features.title: Update Activity 1 (Your Leadership Word) example words list to exactly: ethical, visionary, authentic, resilient, empathetic, principled, transformational, courageous, accountable, inclusive, decisive, adaptable, humble, inspiring, grounded.

On the Activity 1 (Your Leadership Word) page, add the following anonymous-information notice as user-facing text: "Your information is anonymous the only information we see is what is on the top leadership word community patterns board".
Update the Activity 1 submit button label from "Share Your Leadership Word" to exactly "Share Your leadership word For Feedback" (when not in the submitting/loading state).

new_feature_requests.summary: Update Activity 1 'Your Leadership Word' example words list to: ethical, visionary, authentic, resilient, empathetic, principled, transformational, courageous, accountable, inclusive, decisive, adaptable, humble, inspiring, grounded.
Add copy in Activity 1 stating: 'Your information is anonymous the only information we see is what is on the top leadership word community patterns board'.
Update Activity 1 button label from 'Share Your leadership word' to 'Share Your leadership word For Feedback'.

projectName: Activity 1 (Your Leadership Word) copy and button label updates
